headline: A Look At U.S. Bancorp (USB) Valuation After Recent Share Price Momentum
summary: Event context for U.S. Bancorp U.S. Bancorp (USB) has drawn investor attention after recent share price moves, with the stock last closing at $53.93 and short term returns showing mixed performance over the past week, month, and past 3 months. See our latest analysis for U.S. Bancorp.
